org.jasig.cas

Class CasEnvironmentContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.CasEnvironmentContextListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    @Component
public final class CasEnvironmentContextListener
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    A context listener that reports back the CAS application deployment environment info. Details such as CAS versin, Java/OS info as well as the server container info are logged.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CasEnvironmentContextListener()
      Instantiates a new Cas environment context listener.

    • Method Detail

      • logEnvironmentInfo

        @PostConstruct
public void logEnvironmentInfo()
        Logs environment info by collecting details on the java and os deployment environment. Data is logged at DEBUG level.
